name: Voor De Kroon
description:
Fight for control during the Friso-Hollandic Wars. Set in the 13th century, the game features a strategy campaign and large scale battles. Fight with your army in 3rd person battles and command your troops or fight as one of your units in first person.

Voor de kroon is a medieval wargame.

Main Features


EPIC REAL TIME COMBAT
Voor de kroon features formation based battles with up to 600 units at a time. You can fight on foot or on horseback and issue orders to your army. You can command 5 formations of units at a time. You can also fight as one of your units in first person.

CONQUER 13TH CENTURY HOLLAND
Manage your settlements and raise an army. You get to conquer 13th century Holland and fight for your kingdom.

DYNAMIC WEATHER AND SEASONS
Thunderstorms, mist and rain. On top of that it will snow in the winter and the trees show autumn colors.

CREATE A CUSTOM FACTION
Customize your heraldry and character and fight with your own faction.


Solo developed with ♥ in The Netherlands.
